name: Catizen
description: Catizen is a unique, cat-themed social entertainment experience on Telegram, blending playful interactions with the power of the TON Blockchain. As a revolutionary gaming bot, Catizen not only simplifies Web3 access but also makes mobile payments seamless, transforming the way users engage with decentralized technologies. Building on Telegramâ€™s vast user base, Catizen is designed to become a hub for Web3 activities, combining a mini-app center with Launchpool and an Open Task platform. By gamifying the Attention Economy and leveraging Decentralized Value Realization, Catizen creates an ecosystem where users can enjoy engaging, fun, and rewarding experiences.
